channel.title: Project Hybrid Development Team
channel.description:
[center][size=36pt][b][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pRnGQ.png[/img][/b][/size]
Our server has only just been created, we currently have the forums up an running. Our donations system will be set up in a month, donations go towards the server and the website/forums. When our server is up it will be a 24/7 lag free server. Only the best for the community and members.
We are currently looking for the coders and other roles down below. Send you forms in a private message or leave a post.
[code] In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: How old are you?: E-mail address?: What position do you want? (Entertainer, Coder, Suggester, Tester): How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: What time zone are you in?: How long will you be on everyday?: Why do you want to become part of this server?: Any Suggestions?: [/code]
[size=2][b][anchor=staff]6.0 - Staff List[/b][/size]
Entertainers:
[b]0/2[/b]
Coders:
[b]0/2[/b]
Person 1 Person 2

item.title: Project Hybrid Development Team
item.dc:creator: @ishh6263 ishh6263
item.description:
@ishh6263 wrote:

I know this is kinda late and i hope this isnt gravedigging but…

In-Game Name/Server Forums Name: Ishh
How old are you: 15
E-mail address: geoff6263@live.com
What position do you want?: Suggester or Coder (which ever one is free)
How long have you coded?: started basics when i was 11, got into it at 14
What time zone are you in?: GMT -6:00
How long will you be on everyday?: 7-9 hours
Why do you want to become part of this server?: Enjoying do this, want to blow off vacation, expand my learning
Any Suggestions?: Using Dropbox for coding is VERY helpful if you know how to do it correctly

Read full topic

item.title: Project Hybrid Development Team
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Seven programmers is a bit excessive. Code will get clustered, problems will arise quickly and there will quickly be pandemonium within the server. But good luck.

Read full topic
